divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking home from albertsons college when a tall, skinny, grey alien wasreleasing feces in the bushes. it saw me and started chasing me. me and myfreind ran to the closest building which happend to be pizza hut. no onebelieved us then the alien came in and killed everyone buy picking tham up andsmacking there heads against the floor. one man escaped besides us but we dontknow who he was.
Summary: a unidentified creature followed me home from scho
trends: There have been no other sightings in Marsing
This sighting has never been favorited.
